name: The Wood the Bot and the Sluggy
name_original: The Wood the Bot and the Sluggy
description:
In a world where random aliens duel for respect and satisfaction you must come out as the duel master. Using your trusty Marsten Plasma Revolver you must defeat you opponents by aiming at their weak spots and delivering deadly force.

A game built in 28h for the Unity Jam nation game jam.

Made by Team Leviathan 

Game designer: Christopher Setien

Programmer: Marin Combot

2D texture and concept artist: Fabio Toty

3D Props and character artist: Clement Vaugoyau

3D environment artist: Laetitia Morand

3D modeller: Phillipe Girard
